org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server.WebTestClient.BodySpec

  • Packages that use WebTestClient.BodySpec 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server
    Support for testing Spring WebFlux server endpoints via WebTestClient.

    • Uses of WebTestClient.BodySpec in org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  WebTestClient.BodySpec<B,S extends WebTestClient.BodySpec<B,S>>
      Spec for expectations on the response body decoded to a single Object.

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description

      Spec for expectations on the response body decoded to a List.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Consume and decode the response body to a single object of type <B> and then apply assertions.
